description.value:
The purchase of slaves from the Alien Stryxis, who simply refer to them as "Meat". Vat-Grown to fit specifications, Good for killing things. Heretical.

Requirements

Dealing with the Alien Stryxis Rarely just requires an Acquisition Roll, and may require other, stranger costsâ€¦

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
